text: Ihor Kizyma (; born 1997 in Lviv, Ukraine) is a Ukrainian sport shooter. He is the 2019 European silver and bronze medalist as well as multiple World and European junior champion and medalist. ==Career== He became a two-time World junior champion in 2016 in Suhl, Germany. At the 2019 European championships in Osijek, Croatia, he won a silver and a bronze for the first time in his career at the senior level. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at the ISSF site Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male sport shooters Category:Sportspeople from Lviv Category:ISSF pistol shooters
title: Ihor Kizyma
